recipesJson.name: Quick Summer Vape
recipesJson.author: JoeRoots
recipesJson.description:
The sun was  out.
I only had heavy vapes on my shelf.
Had a craving for something light and fresh.
Orange i said... Mmmh 
Lemon lime i said... Mmmh 
Some berries i said... Mmmh.

5 minutets later i said... Mmmh.

I added 0.75 20% solution of ws23. Add to likening.

reviews.text: Just rite amount of every flavours,thanks for sharing.
Vaped 10ml so far in my RTA. Very nice flavour and well balanced
Nice orange vape that is not overpowering.  I added .25% of koolada.
